title: Live, work and play!
posting_body: ['Text 5596A to my cell for more information!', 'Are you ready to make your move into a new home?', ' I’d like to help!', ' As a native Austinite, with 10 years of experience in the rental housing market, I know how to help you in the most efficient and productive way.', ' I have access to thousands of apartments, condos and houses, including the private market.', 'I will not send you random properties, that may or may not be a good fit and that may or may not have anything available.', ' I will send you direct links to the actual property, with up-to-date availability, pricing and floor plans.', ' Once you decide on the properties that are a good fit for you, I will map out a plan and schedule tours, on your behalf, for each individual property.', 'Let me do the work and all you have to do is point and click and show up for the appointment.', 'How do I get paid for my services, you may ask?', ' I get paid by the management company that you choose to lease from.', ' My services are free to you!', ' All that is needed is that you write my name down, on the application, as the referring agent that help you.', 'Disclaimer:  I do not service short term housing.', ' You will have to call the property directly to ask for corporate housing or short-term rental options.', 'Must have excellent rental history, no criminal background record and valid bank records or an offer letter to validate income of three times the rent.', ' Credit scores don’t need to be perfect, as long as you don’t owe any properties money.', 'I look forward to helping you make your home search an easy success!', 'Post', 'S. Lamar - 3057, Austin, TX, 78704', '$1340 per month', 'Available now', '1 bed, 1 full bath', '593 sq.', 'ft.', 'Rooms and Interior', '.', 'Open floor plan', '.', 'Condo quality', '.', 'Hardwood floors', '.', 'Walk-in closet', '.', 'Ceiling fans', '.', 'Master bath', 'Kitchen and Bath', '.', 'Eat-in kitchen', '.', 'Chefs kitchen', '.', 'Granite kitchen counters', '.', 'Hardwood cabinets', '.', 'Stainless steel appliances', '.', 'Dishwasher', '.', 'Refrigerator', '.', 'Stove / oven', '.', 'Microwave', '.', 'Garbage disposal', '.', 'Pantry', '.', 'Soaking tub', '.', 'Tile floors', '.', 'Modern bath fixtures', 'Building and Surroundings', '.', 'New construction', '.', 'Rooftop deck', '.', 'Swimming pool', '.', 'Outdoor pool', '.', '90+ Walkscore', '.', 'LEED certified', 'Amenities and Services', '.', 'On-site manager', '.', 'Fitness center', '.', 'Business center', '.', 'Media room / clubhouse', '.', 'Grill / barbecue', '.', 'Private dog run/park', '.', 'Library', '.', 'Lounge / club room', '.', 'Coffee service', 'Lease Terms', '.', 'Dogs ok', '.', 'Cats ok']
